x x x x x x x x x x-lu-ni x x x x x x x x x x x x i-si-ta-te x x x+x a-na {LU₂}x x x x x x a-na a-lik hu-li a-qab-bi x x x x a-na ZAG u₃ KAB a-šap-par u₃ šum₂-ma a-na-ku a-bat-su la de-iq-tu₂ TA@v pi-i NUMUN-šu₂ a-šam-mu-u-ni u₂-la-a šum₂-ma TA@v pi-i ša 01-en TA@v ŠA₃ {LU₂}GAL-MEŠ {LU₂}NAM-MEŠ TA@v pi-i 01-en TA@v ŠA₃ {LU₂}ša₂-ziq-ni u₂-la-a TA@v pi-i 01-en {LU₂}SAG-MEŠ a-šam-mu-u-ni u₃ a-na {1}aš-šur-PAB-SUM-na EN-ia₂ la a-qab-bu-u-ni šum₂-ma la ARAD-šu₂ a-na-ku-u-ni u₃ de-iq-tu₂-šu₂ la a-zak-kar-u-ni šum₂-ma e-ni-šu₂ la a-dag-gal-u-ni pa-ni ša₂ {1}aš-šur-PAB-SUM-na EN-ia₂ x x x x x x x x x x x x x šum₂-ma a-na-ku ma-mit x x x x x x x x x x+x ur hu ma-mit pa-ša₂-a-ru e-pa-šu-u-ni x x x x x x e-pa-šu-u-ni u₃ šum₂-ma at-ta x x x x x x x x x te-pa-šu-u-ni u₃ šum₂-ma at-ta x x x x x x x x x x te-pa-šu-u-ni u₃ šum₂-ma at-ta x x x x x x x x x x-ʾi-i ša₂ pa-ša₂-a-ri ša₂ x x+x+x x x x AN.ŠAR₂ AD DINGIR-MEŠ LUGAL kiš-šat AN-e u KI.TIM še-ret-su kab-tu₂ li-mid-su x x x x x x x+x-ma ina ma-har DINGIR u LUGAL e-reb-šu₂ a.a iq-bi {d}NIN.LIL₂ AMA GAL-tu₂ hi-ir-tu na-ram-ta-šu x x x x x x x x x ṭe₃-e-šu₂ li-ša₂-ni x+x x x x {d}15 be-let MURUB₄ u ME₃ ina ta-ha-a-zi dan-ni {GIŠ}BAN-šu₂ liš-bir ina ša₂-pal {LU₂}KUR-šu₂ li-še-ši-ib-šu₂ ka-mi₃-iš o {d}UTU x x x x x {GIŠ}zi-ba-ni-tum la kit-ti x x x x x x x x x LAK ina re-bit URU-šu₂ x x x {d}NIN.GAL x x x x x x-bi ina ma-har {d}30 ha-ʾi-ri-ša₂ ab-bu-su a.a iṣ-bat a-mat-su li-lam-min₃ x x x {d}U.GUR dan-dan-nu DINGIR-MEŠ ina šib-ṭi u₃ NAM.UŠ₂-MEŠ x x x x x x x x x li-qat-ta-a UN-MEŠ-šu₂ o x x x x x x x iš-di-šu li-x+x x x x
